event.description:
3 pegs down brings to you #Sufinight with Delhi's #NizamiBandhu of the #KunFayaKun fame from the movie #Rockstar & other songs from #SalmanKhan starrer blockbusters like #BajrangiBhaijan’ & many more.

Nizami Bandhu are very famous & popular Sufi/ Qawwali singers and are among top ranking singers in the country.

So, come and be a part of a soulful night full of music, peace and tranquillity. Get ready to sway to the beats of wholesome #Sufimusic.


  EVENT DETAILS-  

★ Venue : 3 PegsDown, Saket
★ Date : Sunday 16-April-2017
★ Time : 9PM Onwards
★ Bookings & Info: ☏ 095999 71879
event.title: Nizami Bandhu LIVE at 3 Pegs Down

event.description:
Fusion Friday Feat. Astitva at 3 Pegs Down!

Drive into the fusion friday with The Band “Astitva" 
Astitva is a Multi Genre Hindi band based in New Delhi, India. The compositions of Astitva are composed in such a way that a common man can relate to. Every song is different from each other and each song brings out a different emotion, and most of the songs have an entire story wrapped in them. 

Members : 
Amit James - Bassist
Ayush Gupta - Drums And Percussions
Zaman Khan - Guitar
Kamal	- Keyboard
Salman Khan - Vocals



This night will be full of Sufi Rock Music!! 

See you all at 3 Pegs Down on 7th april 2017 | 9PM Onwards.
